description.text:
I am a Systems and Computer Engineering graduate and I am in the process of pre-specialization in Cybersecurity Engineering.
I have experience in the area of web development with JavaScript based technologies such as React.js and Express.js, I also have knowledge in the areas of both management, relational database management and web design using tools like Figma.
I am always looking to expand the horizons of my knowledge and work on my capabilities.
